thread.title: Georgetown's Akoy Agau out indefinitely with torn ACL
thread.title_full: Georgetown's Akoy Agau out indefinitely with torn ACL

author: Colorado theater shooter James Holmes assaulted in prison
title: Georgetown's Akoy Agau out indefinitely with torn ACL
text:
Georgetown's Akoy Agau out indefinitely with torn ACL FOXSports 6 hrs ago Â© Getty Images LOUISVILLE, KY - FEBRUARY 18: Akoy Agau #22 of the Louisville Cardinals looks on during the game against the South Florida Bulls at KFC Yum! Center on February 18, 2014 in Louisville, Kentucky. Louisville defeated South Florida 80-54. (Photo by Joe Robbins/Getty Images) *** Local Caption *** Akoy Agau Akoy Agua transferred to Georgetown midway through last season. Joe Robbins Joe Robbins/Getty Images Georgetown forward Akoy Agua will miss the upcoming season after suffering a torn ACL, head coach John Thompson III announced on Saturday.
AdChoices Agua played in a limited role at Louisville before transferring to Georgetown midway through last season.
The 6-foot-8 Agua was expected to add some depth to a frontcourt that will rely mostly on sophomores and freshmen. Isaac Copeland and Paul White return, while the Hoyas add Jessie Govan and Marcus Derrickson this season.
Agua made 22 appearances for the Cardinals, averaging 0.9 points and 1.0 rebounds per game.
h/t Casual Hoya
